channel.title: data-science-from-scratch on Brendan Knapp
channel.description: Recent content in data-science-from-scratch on Brendan Knapp

item.title: Functions
item.description: Define doubler_*() Function Run doubler_*() Function Define doubler_*() Function r_doubler <- function(x) { x * 2 } def py_doubler(x): return x * 2 #include <Rcpp.h> // [[Rcpp::export]] int cpp_doubler(int x) { return x * 2; } Run doubler_*() Function r_doubler(x = 4) ## [1] 8 print(py_doubler(x = 4)) ## 8 cpp_doubler(x = 4) ## [1] 8
